title: Justin Bieber shares snap of blinged out 'wifey' necklace he gave Hailey for second wedding
text:
He may have finally released his highly-anticipated new song with Dan + Shay.

But Justin Bieber's wedding still seems to be at the center of all the buzz.

The 25-year-old singer took to his Instagram Story on Thursday night to share a snap of one of his wedding gifts to new wife Hailey.

Bling bling: Justin Bieber took to his Instagram Story on Thursday night to share a snap of one of his wedding gifts to new wife Hailey

A dream: No doubt she got the sparkly jewelry from her husband earlier this week after their second wedding ceremony in South Carolina

The image showed the 22-year-old model's brand new blinged out necklace which read 'wifey' on it.

No doubt she got the sparkly jewelry from her husband earlier this week after their second wedding ceremony in South Carolina.

Earlier in the day the two were spotted heading to the park in Los Angeles for a romantic picnic on Thursday night.

Squad: Justin released a new track with country act Dan + Shay on Thursday

New passion: Justin's new hobby is learning how to unicycle

Impressive: Justin seems to be a quick learner as he road off on the one-wheeler

Moving: He captioned the image: 'Little wobbly. Each day we go father and father'

The pop star, 25, wore a bright yellow, oversized t-shirt from his fashion line Drew House.

He matched the shirt to white and yellow sneakers, pairing the look with skinny grey sweats.

Justin also wore a black Sergio Tacchini bucket hat as he carried a white plastic bag filled with food and drinks.

Meanwhile his wife of one year wore a black spaghetti strap crop and revealed her shoulders as a black cardigan hung on her arm.

Dinner in the park: Justin and Hailey headed to the park in Los Angeles for a romantic picnic on Thursday night

Can't get enough: The picnic comes after their (second) wedding on Monday

His look: The pop star, 25, wore a bright yellow, oversized t-shirt from his fashion line Drew House and a black bucket hat

Slipping: Meanwhile his wife of one year wore a black spaghetti strap crop and revealed her shoulders as a black cardigan hung on her arm

The 22-year-old model paired it with black stripped slacks that were cuffed, and black, laced up combat boots.

Hailey took inspiration from her hubby, wearing neon yellow rectangular sunglasses.

She looked cool and casual with her hair in a low bun, and pairing it with large gold hoop earrings and a silver chain necklace.

Accessories: The 22-year-old model paired it with black stripped slacks that were cuffed, and black, laced up combat boots

Thirsty: She sipped from a plastic water bottle as she walked back to their car

Got dirt: They both carried fuzzy blankets for their park venture, which seemed to be dirty on one side after they enjoyed their meal

They both carried fuzzy blankets for their park venture, which seemed to be dirty on one side after they enjoyed their meal.

Afterwards Justin was seen riding around on a big wheeled bicycle.

On Wednesday and Thursday he also shared he was learning to ride a unicycle.

New ride: Afterwards Justin was seen riding around on a big wheeled bicycle

Up high: He sat up high on the black bike

Hobby: On Wednesday and Thursday he also shared he was learning to ride a unicycle

New photos: Hailey and Justin Bieber showcased their wedding bands in new pictures on Tuesday

It has been a whirlwind week for Justin, who dropped a brand new romantic single on Thursday called 10,000 Hours with Dan + Shay.

'I'd spend 10,000 hours and 10,000 more, oh, if that's what it takes to learn that sweet heart of yours,' the newlywed croons in the chorus.

'And I might never get there, but I'm gonna try. If it's 10,000 hours or the rest of my life, I'm gonna love you,' sings Justin.

Collaboration: It has been a whirlwind week for Justin, who dropped a brand new romantic single on Thursday called 10,000 Hours with Dan + Shay

He had referred to the then-upcoming single as 'Wedding music,' while promoting it on Twitter this Wednesday.

On Tuesday the 25-year-old and his bride shared some inside shots portraits taken at their wedding reception.

In striking black and white shots, taken in the photobooth, the couple showed off what amounted to an estimated $750,000.

So sweet: 'I'd spend 10,000 hours and 10,000 more, oh, if that's what it takes to learn that sweet heart of yours,' the newlywed croons in the chorus

The not-so-newlyweds, who first tied the knot over a year ago, kicked off the night by exchanging vows in a chapel in front of a legion of celebrity guests.

As pictures of the day leaked through across the evening, the happy couple eventually shared solo portraits which displayed the blingy elements.

Hailey perfectly matched her $500,000 engagement ring with a diamond wave shape band, believed to have come from Tiffany & Co.

The Vogue model was also seen wearing a large pair of platinum-set studs from the designer jewelry brand that were over five carats and worth over $123,000.

Gorgeous: Hailey perfectly matched her $500,000 engagement ring with a diamond wave shape band

Not sparing any expense: But that wasn't the only piece of jewelry for the Sorry pop-star, rocking his Israeli diamond $25,000 lavender grillz

Sparkler: Justin showcased his new accessory on social media last week and it is estimated to be worth $25K, according to TMZ

Justin and Hailey's extraordinary bling $500,000 Tiffany engagement ring $100,000 Audemars Piguet watch $25,000 Lavender grillz $123,000 Diamond earrings

Justin meanwhile opted for a more simple look than his blinged-up bride as he donned a band of a thicker design on his wedding ring finger.

But that wasn't the only piece of jewelry for the Sorry pop star, rocking his Israeli diamond $25,000 lavender grillz.

Justin showcased his new accessory on social media last week and it is estimated to be worth $25,000, according to TMZ.

The singer also accessorized with his new $100,000 Audemars Piguet watch that he splurged on just days before the big day. 'Got myself a lil wedding gift,' he captioned at the time.

It was initially reported that Justin's watch cost $50,000, however new reports from TMZ claim the rare model is likely double that estimate.

Hailey and Justin shared the photos online for their followers, with the beauty captioning it with a red love heart. Justin penned: 'Looking forward to forever with you @haileybieber.' She replied: 'forever with my favorite human.'

Following their lavish posts, an overjoyed Justin and Hailey officially arrived back in Los Angeles after their romantic wedding.

The couple boarded a Gulfstream IV jet in Savannah, Georgia, bound for Van Nuys, California earlier on Tuesday. They arrived to Los Angeles a later that night and were seen stepping off the plane after a nearly five-hour flight.

The pair arrived in California with friends and gifts in tow; although, it's unclear who exactly was on the plane with them.

The executive jet is a rental that costs $13,500 per flying hour to hire. Before their arrival in California, Justin shared a video on Instagram of them having a bit of fun before their flight.

Here we are! Before their arrival in California, Justin shared a video on Instagram of them having a bit of fun before their flight

In the video, Hailey is attempting to kiss Justin who is heard telling her: 'Get off of me.', 'We're married now. No more love,' Justin teases as Hailey starts to pout. He then says: 'Aw me's kidding.'

Their Monday ceremony was held at the luxury Montage Palmetto Bluffs hotel in Bluffton, South Carolina. The event kicked off in style with a rehearsal dinner at Moreland Landing, a small banqueting hall on the property, on Sunday evening.

Although the festivities continued into the early hours, the couple threw a farewell brunch on Tuesday morning at Buffalo's – a southern comfort food restaurant in the hotel grounds.

The brunch, which cost $95-a-head, included a choice of bottomless mimosas or bloody marys. All of the guests stayed at the Montage Palmetto Bluffs; a five-star hotel that says it offers 'upmarket accommodation in a plantation style resort'.
description: The 25-year-old singer took to his Instagram Story on Thursday night to share a snap of one of his wedding gifts to new wife Hailey.
